casebody.data:
ESTELLE M. WEINER, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT CROSS-APPELLANT, v. HOWARD M. WEINER, DEFENDANT-APPELLANT CROSS-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Argued December 19, 1973 Decided January 8, 1974.

Before Judges Leonard, Allcorn and Crahay.

Mr. Howard M. Weiner, appellant-cross-respondent, argued the cause pro se. Mr. Edward D. McKirdy argued the cause for the respondent-cross-appellant (Messrs. McKirdy and Riskin, P.A., attorneys.) Per Curiam.

The judgment of the Chancery Division is affirmed essentially for the reasons set forth in the opinion of Judge Polow.
